channel.title: Debugging on The IMSAI Gang
channel.description: Recent content in Debugging on The IMSAI Gang

item.title: Debugging the Cremenco TU-ART Card
item.description: This is the first [and potentially the last :( ] time I am writing for this blog. I’ve been working at the VIP for 2 semesters, and my work primarily focused on getting the IMSAI 8080 to work. Here I document my work with the Cremenco TU-ART card, and how Calvin and I tried to get it to work with a PuTTY terminal. Background Work done previously by Calvin had led to the discovery of the FTDI interface, a way to convert USB communication to Serial communication (TTL level) and vice versa.
